channel.title: Soulx New Server 24/7!
channel.description:
Soulx New Awesome Server With Extreme Updates! hey guys , it's new rsps You Can Join Us if U want Staff Needed Players Can't Dupe Couse We fixed all Dupes Ways. There is events Every Weekend like Drop party,Double Exp,Hide n seek.. There is auto Donate Which U Can Donate For Donor points every point worth 1$ u can check the shop Its in Home.[/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://soulx.info/SoulX.htm"]click here to join ! [/URL] [COLOR="Red"]Features:[/COLOR] *free to play *advanced server you can find a ton of activities [COLOR="red"]what you can find on soulx:[/COLOR] *a good website with alot of systems auto donate,vote 4 cash,and the highscores will add soon . *good server with good exp rate and you can make money fast ! * there alot of bosses : like kbd , nomad, corpal beast , avatar and alot of new bosses ( we added nex but it's need a small fix ) . * good minigames : pc,barrows,dung,fightcave *24 skills work we got pking skill too ! *all skill capes work *we got alot of shops ( donor shop , vote shop ,dung shops ,pkp shop,and armor shop and summoing shops ) . there a few that need fix . * alot of zones chill zone donor zone mod zone admin zone owner zone *dung is fun there a 8 floors ( we will add floor later ! *there alot of customs items ( comp cape ,max cape ,classic cape ,veteran cape , steadfast ,gavin,ragefire boots , new fire cape ) . we will add new customs phats and items !!! * sprites is amazing the rsps loading at 711 sprites ! * amazing donor zone got alot of benfits !
WE WORKED IN THESE SERVER CODERS : JHAACK +OUTLAWPKZ WE USED : TORVA PKZ 317 DON'T SAY IT'S LEECH CUZ WE WORKED HARD ! PLEASE JOIN US !
